consent.title: Before you start using the chat
consent.subtitle: Please use the chatbot as much as you want! It is part of research in AI chatbots. Below is an explanation.

purpose.title: Purpose of the Study
purpose.description: This study evaluates the effectiveness of chatbots and language models in a digital learning platform.

data.title: Data Collection & Risk
data.description: By participating, you consent to the recording of your interactions for research purposes only. You may be asked for feedback. Participation holds no risks beyond everyday life.
